Wed., Oct. 18: Get your tickets to the 32nd Annual Kandler Awards Dinner today!
  


Never Silent: Voices of Freedom

2017 Kandler Dinner
Wednesday, October 18
5:30 p.m. Cocktails
6:30 p.m. Dinner
Chase Center on the Riverfront

Purchase Tickets
Share this:           

HONOR DELAWARE'S VOICES OF FREEDOM!

The 32nd Annual Kandler Memorial Awards Dinner, "Never Silent: Voices of Freedom," is just three weeks away, and you're invited!

Join us as we honor Sarah, Sally and David McBride, activists for transgender rights, and Theopalis "Theo" K. Gregory, Sr., advocate for racial justice and disability rights. ACLU cooperating attorney Marion Quirk will also receive the Clarence Darrow Award for her work on behalf of incarcerated persons, and ACLU National Legal Director David Cole will provide remarks on the ACLU's national agenda.

Don't miss out! Visit our website for tickets and sponsorship opportunities. For more information, contact Director of Development Dave Bever.

We hope to see you there!

ACLU of Delaware
